events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but it doesn't fit me at all. I would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The case has been reviewed and categorized under Refund due to the customer's request for money back.
An agent has been assigned to manage the refund process for this case and to assist you further.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I’m here to help you with your refund request for the jacket you ordered.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the item has been returned or if you need assistance with the return process?
My order number is 123456789. I have not sent the jacket back yet because I wasn’t sure about the return address.
Thank you for the information. Please send the jacket to our return center at the address provided in your shipment details. Once we receive the item, we will process your refund immediately.
Thanks for the quick response and clear instructions. I will ship the jacket back today and look forward to the refund.
We have received your returned jacket and processed the refund to your original payment method. Please allow 3-5 business days for the transaction to show up.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund successfully and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since your refund has been completed and no further issues were reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for shopping with us.
